name: HKSourceRevision
desc: An object indicating the source of a HealthKit sample.

items.name: init(source: HKSource, version: String?)
items.desc: Initializes a new source revision object with the provided source and version information.

items.name: init(source: HKSource, version: String?, productType: String?, operatingSystemVersion: OperatingSystemVersion)
items.desc: Initializes a new source revision object with the provided source, version, product type, and operating system.

items.name: var version: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies a particular version of the source.

items.name: var operatingSystemVersion: OperatingSystemVersion
items.desc: A string that identifies the operating system used to save a sample.

items.name: var productType: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the device used to save a sample.
